text:
Went there for the 4-6pm Saturday vocal class on the 3rd floor music room anchored by pastor Angkasa where we were taught to sing famous mandarin secular songs.

I like the pastors of the English, mandarin and Tamil services. Personally, I've attended all of them and found them pleasing and rife with the presence of the HOLY spirit. The congregation members are also open for conversation.

I was invited back for the Friday 5.30-7pm practice for spiritual songs. Hope I can make it!

It's  a beautiful Church with a great historical
richness that was initiated in 1951.  It's
contributions to enhance the cohesive
Chinese, Indian and Eurasian Migrants add
a rich tapestry of history since the Colonial
Days.
A multi racial, multi lingual church that is welcoming. Tamil, Chinese and Eng services are run here. Wonderful youth group.
Warm and welcoming church. Very suitable for families and tourists who wants to find a place to worship while on tour. They have a service at 11am which caters to the international community.
great church although i only see it from the outside
